line.data-tooltip-text: s is the unique value that can access the data in memory
some values are statically referencing to s
some values are statically referencing to s
some values are statically referencing to s
s is the unique value that can access the data in memory
s is the unique value that can access the data in memory
some values are statically referencing to r1; can only read data
some values are statically referencing to r1; can only read data
some values are statically referencing to r1; can only read data
some values are statically referencing to r1; can only read data
some values are statically referencing to r1; can only read data
some values are statically referencing to r1; can only read data
some values are statically referencing to r2; can only read data
some values are statically referencing to r2; can only read data
some values are statically referencing to r2; can only read data
some values are statically referencing to r2; can only read data
some values are statically referencing to r2; can only read data
some values are statically referencing to r2; can only read data
r3 is the unique value that can access the data in memory; can read and write data; can not point to another piece of data
r3 is the unique value that can access the data in memory; can read and write data; can not point to another piece of data
some values are statically referencing to r3; can only read data
some values are statically referencing to r3; can only read data
r3 is the unique value that can access the data in memory; can read and write data; can not point to another piece of data
r3 is the unique value that can access the data in memory; can read and write data; can not point to another piece of data

path.data-tooltip-text: cannot mutate the resource it refers to
cannot mutate the resource it refers to
can mutate the resource it refers to

use.data-tooltip-text: obtains data from String::from() (s's lifetime begins from here)
statically lends its data to r1 (s becomes read-only)
statically lends its data to r2 (s becomes read-only)
r1 no longer borrows from s
r2 no longer borrows from s
mutably lends its data to r3 (s becomes un-readable until the end of r3's lifetime)
r3 is no longer a mutable referece of s, so we may read and write the data
s goes out of scope. The data is dropped.
statically borrows data from s (r1 gains read only access to data)
statically lends its data to println!() (r1 becomes read-only)
println!() no longer borrows from r1
returns borrowed data to s (r1's lifetime ends here)
r1 goes out of scope. The data is not dropped because r1 is not the owner.
statically borrows data from s (r2 gains read only access to data)
statically lends its data to println!() (r2 becomes read-only)
println!() no longer borrows from r2
returns borrowed data to s (r2's lifetime ends here)
r2 goes out of scope. The data is not dropped because r2 is not the owner.
mutably borrows data from s (r3 gains read and write access to data)
statically lends its data to println!() (r3 becomes read-only)
println!() no longer borrows from r3
returns borrowed data to s (r3's lifetime ends here)
r3 goes out of scope. The data is not dropped because r3 is not the owner.

polyline.data-tooltip-text: Move from the return value of String::from() to s
Static borrow from s to r1
Static borrow from s to r2

use.data-tooltip-text: println!() reads from r1
println!() reads from r2

polyline.data-tooltip-text: Return statically borrowed resource from r1 to s
Return statically borrowed resource from r2 to s
Mutable borrow from s to r3

use.data-tooltip-text: println!() reads from r3

polyline.data-tooltip-text: Return mutably borrowed resource from r3 to s
